Category.name: couponvectors
Category.description: functions to construct and use Leg objects

Parameter.name: PaymentBDC
Parameter.description: payment business day convention. If omitted, default = Following.

Parameter.name: Nominals
Parameter.description: Nominal amount vector. If omitted, default = 1000000

Parameter.name: ScheduleID
Parameter.description: Schedule object ID

Parameter.name: Coupons
Parameter.description: coupon fixed rates

Parameter.name: DayCounter
Parameter.description: Payment day counter (e.g. 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)')

Parameter.name: PaymentBDC
Parameter.description: payment business day convention. If omitted, default = Following.

Parameter.name: Nominals
Parameter.description: Nominal amount vector. If omitted, default = 1000000

Parameter.name: ScheduleID
Parameter.description: Schedule object ID

Parameter.name: FixingDays
Parameter.description: fixing days (e.g. 2). If omitted, default = index natural fixing days

Parameter.name: IsInArrears
Parameter.description: TRUE if the fixing is in arrears. If omitted, default = FALSE

Parameter.name: DayCounter
Parameter.description: Payment day counter (e.g. 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)')

Parameter.name: Floors
Parameter.description: floor strikes. If omitted, default = no floor

Parameter.name: Gearings
Parameter.description: floating rate gearings. If omitted, default = 1.0

Parameter.name: IborIndex
Parameter.description: floating rate index

Parameter.name: Spreads
Parameter.description: floating rate spreads. If omitted, default = 0%

Parameter.name: Caps
Parameter.description: cap strikes. If omitted, default = no cap

Parameter.name: PaymentBDC
Parameter.description: payment business day convention. If omitted, default = Following.

Parameter.name: Nominals
Parameter.description: Nominal amount vector. If omitted, default = 1000000

Parameter.name: ScheduleID
Parameter.description: Schedule object ID

Parameter.name: FixingDays
Parameter.description: fixing days (e.g. 2). If omitted, default = index natural fixing days

Parameter.name: IsInArrears
Parameter.description: TRUE if the fixing is in arrears. If omitted, default = FALSE

Parameter.name: DayCounter
Parameter.description: Payment day counter (e.g. 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)')

Parameter.name: Gearings
Parameter.description: floating rate gearings. If omitted, default = 1.0

Parameter.name: IborIndex
Parameter.description: floating rate index

Parameter.name: Spreads
Parameter.description: floating rate spreads. If omitted, default = 0%

Parameter.name: CallStrikes
Parameter.description: digital call option strikes. If omitted, no call option is assumed.

Parameter.name: CallPosition_Inclusion
Parameter.description: position of the call option and inclusion of ATM .

Parameter.name: CallPayoff
Parameter.description: payoff if the call digital option ends in-the-money. If omitted, asset-or-nothing digital option is assumed.

Parameter.name: PutStrikes
Parameter.description: digital put option strikes. If omitted, no put option is assumed.

Parameter.name: PutPositionAtmInclusion
Parameter.description: position (Short, Long) of the put option and inclusion of ATM.

Parameter.name: PutPayoff
Parameter.description: payoff if the put digital option ends in-the-money. If omitted, asset-or-nothing digital option is assumed.

Parameter.name: Replication
Parameter.description: Replication type (Sub, Central, Super)

Parameter.name: Gap
Parameter.description: spread in strikes used in call/put replication. If omitted, default = 1bp

Parameter.name: PaymentBDC
Parameter.description: payment business day convention. If omitted, default = Following.

Parameter.description: Nominal amount vector. If omitted, default = 1000000

Parameter.name: ObservationsTenor
Parameter.description: observations tenor period

Parameter.name: ObservationsBDC
Parameter.description: observations business day convention. If omitted, default = Modified Following.

Parameter.name: Volatility
Parameter.description: Caplet Volatility Structure object ID

Parameter.name: IborCouponPricerType
Parameter.description: Ibor Coupon Pricer Type (e.g IborByBlack, ..)

Parameter.name: Volatility
Parameter.description: Swaption Volatility Structure object ID

Parameter.name: CmsCouponPricerType
Parameter.description: Cms Coupon Pricer Type (e.g ConundrumByBlack, ConundrumByNumericalIntegration, ClassicalAnaliticalFormula)

Parameter.name: ModelOfYieldCurve
Parameter.description: model of the yield curve (e.g Standard, ExactYield, ParallelShifts, NonParallelShifts)

Parameter.name: MeanReversion
Parameter.description: mean reversion quote.

Parameter.name: SwaptionVol
Parameter.description: Volatility Cube by Sabr

Parameter.name: ModelOfYieldCurve
Parameter.description: model of the yield curve (e.g Standard, ExactYield, ParallelShifts, NonParallelShifts)

Parameter.name: MeanReversion
Parameter.description: mean reversion

Parameter.name: LowerLimit
Parameter.description: lower limit. If omitted, default = 0.0 is used.

Parameter.name: UpperLimit
Parameter.description: upper limit If omitted, default = 1.0 is used.

Parameter.name: Precision
Parameter.description: precision If omitted, default = 1.0e-6 is used.

Member.name: qlConundrumPricerByNumericalIntegrationUpperLimit
Member.description: Returns the upper limit of the integral
